name: Spellsword Cards: Demontide
description: A unique solo quest card combat adventure with 500+ cards, drafting, roguelike and puzzle modes of play. The campaign features a unique MULTI-CLASSING SYSTEM and 50 boss fights plus hundreds of encounters.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system Storage: 1100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Any Processor: Any Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 1100 MB available space
